info.name: Need2Know API
info.description:
# Getting Start:

1. Import the database_dump.sql into a database and change the database credentials in the .env file of the backend project folder.
    
2. Run the following command to populate the database with data:
    

`php artisan migrate:refresh --seed`

3\. Change the baseUrl variable value for this collection to your host name.
